record.text:
We are announcing the ability to record and review full-screen representative activity in Dynamics 365 Customer Service. This feature will reach general availability on March 27, 2026.

How does this affect me?
This feature records full‑screen representative activity during customer interactions […]

external.description:
We are announcing the ability to record and review full-screen representative activity in Dynamics 365 Customer Service. This feature will reach general availability on March 27, 2026.

**How does this affect me?**
This feature records full‑screen representative activity during customer interactions and uploads it for review, giving supervisors an exact view of what occurred in each session. The system records the active monitor, includes system audio when full‑screen capture is enabled, and securely uploads the file to Dataverse at session end. Local copies are automatically deleted to protect sensitive data.

Supervisors can review, download, and analyze recordings for coaching, quality assurance, and compliance. Each file includes metadata, such as case ID and representative name, for accurate identification and retrieval. Recordings support durations up to two hours with built‑in guardrails for performance and file size. As recordings are triggered by channel activity, no manual setup is required in automatic capture scenarios. For workflows requiring manual control, such as monitoring agents working on chats or cases, representatives can start and stop recordings manually.

Administrators can disable screen recording by uninstalling the Desktop Capture Application client, turning off channel‑based triggers, or configuring role‑based access so only authorized users can view or download recordings.

**What action do I need to take?**
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.
external.title: MC1238923: Dynamics 365 Customer Service - Record and review full‑screen representative activity

record.text: Starting late March to April 2026, Microsoft 365 Copilot app will allow admins to add a branded footer with their organization's logo, confirming a trusted Copilot environment. This feature is off by default, requires admin setup via the Microsoft 365 admin center, and affects all tenants using t...

external.description:
**[Introduction]**

We’re introducing a new co-branding capability that will allow organizations to **display a branded footer** at the bottom of the Chat screen in the _Microsoft 365 Copilot app_. This update will enable admins to add their organization’s logo to their users’ Microsoft 365 Copilot app, helping users confirm they are using their trusted, work-managed Copilot experience.

This feature will begin rolling out in **March 2026** and is expected to complete by**late April 2026**.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 555852.

**[When this will happen]**

  * **General Availability (Worldwide):** Rollout will begin in**late March 2026** and is expected to complete by**late April 2026**.



**[How this will affect your organization]**

_Who is affected_

  * All Microsoft 365 tenants using the Microsoft 365 Copilot app.



What will happen

  * Admins will be able to upload a logo in the _Microsoft 365 admin center_ to customize the footer in the _Microsoft 365 Copilot app_.
  * Only the logo from your organization’s theme configuration will be used; other theme elements will not be applied in this release.
  * This feature will be **off by default** and will require admin configuration.
  * There will be**no user impact** unless an admin enables the footer.



The footer will display an “** _Approved by [Logo]_ ”** indicator to help users confirm they are in an _organization-approved Copilot environment:_

**[What you can do to prepare]**

No action will be required unless you want to enable the branded footer.

Admins who want to configure this feature should:

  * Review and verify your organization’s theme configuration in the _Microsoft 365 admin center_.
  * Upload the logo you want to display in the _Microsoft 365 Copilot app footer_ once rollout begins.
  * Use the existing theme management flow to apply co-branding once the feature is available.



For configuration guidance: Customize the theme for your organization | Microsoft 365 | Microsoft Learn

**[Compliance considerations]**

No compliance considerations identified. Review as appropriate for your organization.
external.title: MC1238432: Microsoft 365 Copilot app: Branded footer customization

record.text: Windows first sign-in restore experience is now generally available as part of Windows Backup for Organizations. Users signing in for the first time on an eligible device will see a restore experience at first sign-in, even if it was missed the first time the device was turned on (Windows out of […]

external.description:
Windows first sign-in restore experience is now generally available as part of Windows Backup for Organizations. Users signing in for the first time on an eligible device will see a restore experience at first sign-in, even if it was missed the first time the device was turned on (Windows out of box experience). This allows users to restore Windows settings, restore their Microsoft Store app list, or choose to configure the device as new.This update extends restore capabilities beyond Microsoft Entra-joined devices to support hybrid-managed environments, improving readiness for new or reimaged Windows 11 devices. For more information, see Windows first sign-in restore experience now available**When this will happen:** General availability begins with devices that have installed Windows updates released February 24, 2026, and later.**How this affects your organization:** This feature is available to IT admins managing Windows 11 devices using Windows Backup for Organizations, as well as eligible devices where sign-in occurs with a Microsoft Entra ID, including Microsoft Entra hybrid-joined devices and Windows 365 Cloud PCs.The experience is controlled by admins and governed by existing Windows Backup for Organizations policies. Note that it is not enabled unless allowed by admin policy, and no changes are made to existing user data beyond what is already supported by Windows Backup for Organizations. No action is required if you do not want to offer restore at first sign-in, as existing policies remain in effect.**What you can do to prepare:** If you already use Windows Backup for Organizations, you can enable the first sign-in restore experience using your existing management tools, such as the Microsoft Intune settings. Group Policy options also exist. Make sure to validate device eligibility and deployment scenarios against system requirements.**Additional information:**

  * Windows first sign-in restore experience now available
  * Windows Backup for Organizations
  * What is Microsoft Entra?
external.title: MC1238409: Windows first sign-in restore experience now available

record.text: まずは、消費税の中に居座っている法人減税分を排除すべきかと。あるいは、法人税自体に社会保障税を含める、って話があるのならば "国民会議" 自体は意味があるかな。

国民会議の参加/不参加を求める二択は、典型的なダブルバインドの手法。第三の選択肢（国会での議論等）を認めないのは、そこを意図してやっているわけですが。

過去に「国民会議」としての形態はあるのだけど、手法の有効性を議論するならば有識者が会議が先でしょう。まあ、これも時間がかかるわけですが、"時間をかける" という点は一緒だし、そもそも選挙中の「消費税減税」自体が、何も考え無しだったということが、バレているという...

record.text:
ワシの交友関係に高等遊民が混じっています。
予約してくれたご庶民価格の居酒屋で呑んでいるわけですが、そこは「食べログ」に掲載されていないし、その落ち着いた感じのコートやバッグが一品ものであることは見て分かりますもの😉
プログラミングに必要な数学・物理学の知識は、はるかに上の学年で学ぶものだったので、図書室に足繁く通い、わからないところは専門科の先生やOBから聞き出し（中高一貫校のメリット）‥‥天体力学からはじまり、1979年7月のスカイラブの落下地点予測では流体力学の世界に足を踏み入れ、1980年代前半のニューラルネットワークで原始的なベクトルコンピュータを試作‥‥「その先を見たい」という好奇心が原動力です✨

value.text: いまになって思うけど、学部4年で最初から生物飛行CFDのラボではなく、流体物理系CFDのラボだったことはとても貴重な経験だったなぁ…たった1年間で、しかも僕はサボりがちだったのだけれど（すいません）、いまだに考え方のベースとして残ってる。当時はプログラミングをして手を動かしてなんとか結果を出すってことばかり考えてたけど、残るのはそこではなく、外力項を含んだN-Sの無次元化で多様な無次元数が出てくるというようなとこなんだなあ。今のラボで学生さんにそういうことを残せているか…まぁマクロ生物学的な発想とかは多少？

external.description: TM-140. Photo: Rostec Kurganmashzavod, part of Rostec's “High Precision Systems” holding, supplied this year's first TM-140 all-terrain vehicle for mineral exploration operations in the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia). The information was released on February 25 by Rostec. The equipment will be used in conditions typical of the region, such as compacted snow, permafrost and mountainous terrain. Yacútia is known for its low temperatures and limited infrastructure in remote areas, factors that require specific logistical solutions.

🎙️ Charaktere & Cast (Japanisch)
»Suzuki« von Shinya Takahashi

Mit einem neuen Charakter Visual stellen die Verantwortlichen ein weiters Mitglied des japanischen Sprechercasts offiziell vor. Der Anime startet im Juli im japanischen TV.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Der einzige Lichtblick im tristen Arbeitsalltag des mittelalten Sasaki ist das freundliche Lächeln von Yamada, einer Kassiererin im 24-Stunden-Supermarkt, den er regelmäßig besucht. Doch eines Abends verpasst er ihre Schicht und trifft hinter dem Laden auf die provokante und geheimnisvolle Tayama, die ihn kurzerhand zum gemeinsamen Rauchen einlädt. Zwischen neckischen Kommentaren und Zigarettenpausen entsteht eine unerwartete Nähe, während Sasaki nun aus gleich zwei Gründen im Supermarkt auftaucht. Mit jeder Begegnung zeigt sich, dass hinter Tayamas spielerischem Auftreten mehr steckt, als es zunächst scheint. Eine leise, erwachsene Geschichte über Einsamkeit, kleine Fluchten und unerwartete Verbindungen beginnt.

Mit einem neuen Trailer und einem Visual wurde der genaue Starttermin für »Ghost Concert: Missing Songs« offiziell bekannt gegeben. Der Anime startet am 5. April im japanischen TV. Im Trailer ist erstmals der Opening-Song »Gakkon REQUIEMER« von Seria Aiba (CV: Minori Fujidera) zu hören, während der Ending-Song »Ibara no Michi« von Odysseus (CV: Minako Kotobuki) stammt. Zudem wurden weitere Mitglieder des japanischen Sprechercasts offiziell vorgestellt.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Im Jahr 2045 ist Singen verboten und Musik wird nur noch von der App MiucS erzeugt. Als Seria Aiba plötzlich eine echte menschliche Singstimme hört, folgt sie dem Klang und begegnet etwas, das es eigentlich nicht geben dürfte: einem Geist. Doch dieser Geist ist kein gewöhnlicher Spuk, sondern ein sogenannter Great Ghost. Durch diese Begegnung wird Seria in eine verborgene Welt hineingezogen, die ihr Leben für immer verändert.

HOUR

The extra hour given back to eternity 
The hour gained by travelling west 
The hour of the imagined empire
The deepest hour of the darkest sea 
The guilty hour that precedes catastrophe
The hour that it takes to go from here to there
The haunted hour of the knowledge of death
The hour in which the moon darkens
The hour that moves through the mind like cloud shadow
The blue hour that rests on the roof of the house
The hour that is the mother of minutes and grandmother of seconds 
The swollen hour of pain, enough, enough
The hour when mice run in the walls
The bronze hour of electrical weather
The cloistered hour of the nun's great moment 
The necklace of hours the widow wears
The numbing hours of a night in Nome 
The sound of hours in the breathing of plants 
The central hour that exists without you 
The hour in which the universe begins to die 
The hallucinatory hour that hangs forever
The hour of excess that equals two of self-examination 
The hour that flashed on the skin
The hour of final music
The hour of painless solitude
The hour of moonlight upon her body

Google Gemini can book an Uber or order food for you with new agentic AI features

Google’s Gemini AI is getting one step closer to being more like an actual assistant. Starting with some Pixel 10 phones and the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, Gemini will be able to hail an Uber or put together a…

external.description: Google’s Gemini AI is getting one step closer to being more like an actual assistant. Starting with some Pixel 10 phones and the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, Gemini will be able to hail an Uber or put together a DoorDash order on its own. It’s called task automation, and it starts with a prompt to Gemini — something like “Get me an Uber to the Palace of Fine Arts.” Gemini then launches the app in a virtual window on your device and goes through the process step-by-step.
external.title: Google Gemini can book an Uber or order food for you with new agentic AI features

What used to require 10 people can now be done by 2-3 sharp operators with the right AI stack.

This doesn't eliminate jobs. It eliminates teams that aren't high-leverage.

You don't need their headcount. You need better leverage. You need to use AI better.

The question isn't "will AI replace me?"

By the time I open my laptop, my 🦞 AI agent has already:

- Handled support tickets
- Sent outreach emails
- Bid on freelance projects
- Checked and did work on my todos
- Checked Sentry errors

Not a demo. Actual business functions. Running every day.

Every SaaS company is adding an "AI agent."

Almost none of them understand what that actually means for their business model.

If your agent replaces 5 user seats, you just lost 5x MRR unless you reprice.

#美股# 
去年10月，市场热议的话题是AI热潮是否正在演变成泡沫。如今，这个问题似乎已成为遥远的记忆，各类投机性AI主题停滞不前，而非垂直飙升。https://www.atdailytrains.com/client_activity2025_nov/?utm_source=fx007&utm_medium=media_buy&utm_campaign=cn_media_buy_fx007_activity2025_nov

投机情绪的缺失也可从看涨/看跌期权比率中看出，目前1.13倍的水平远未达到狂热程度。

股票和债券的投资者资金流入持续强劲，表明长期投资者对当前投资环境感到安心。

#日本经济# 
不要被日本0.2%的GDP增速所迷惑——日本经济的实际增速正在悄然回升。

1月份，出口同比增长16.8%，创三年多来最快增速，这主要得益于全球对芯片的旺盛需求。

与此同时，2月份的PMI指数也创下33个月以来的新高，表明私营部门正经历大规模扩张，出口需求也达到八年来的最高水平。

这只是暂时的反弹，还是日本终于摆脱了通缩的阴影，将在 2026 年引领全球增长？

#美元正在暴跌# 
美元兑G10货币基本保持稳定，但兑新兴市场货币却几乎每天都在创下新低。https://www.xmcntrader.direct/gw.php?gid=248949
这一切的主要受益者之一是巴西雷亚尔和人民币，其兑美元汇率创下近两年来的新高。
